main event: A woman reported seeing an unidentified flying object over Fort Lauderdale, Florida, on 16 October 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as silvery or white in color,The size of the object was comparable to a golf ball,The object was moving at a high rate of speed,It was visible for approximately 3-4 seconds,No other witnesses were identified and no physical evidence was found.
sighted object: a silvery or white object about the size of a golf ball
witness description: a woman who reported the sighting
